group_1.textLeft: Wow! There's a line.

group_1.textRight: This looks very promising.

group_1.textLeft: It does! And while we're at it...

group_1.textRight: Is that the present from the maid?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
I wonder what it is...@[chara:403201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:403201:motion_200][chara:403201:lipSynch_1]Ta-da!

group_1.textRight: Oh, a headband...is that a bone?

group_1.textLeft: Oooh, this must be the one the new maid got@by mistake.

group_1.textRight: It's made of fine material, and the design@is very elaborate...

group_1.textLeft: That's maids for you, very professional!
[chara:403201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wh-what?!
(She looks fine...)
(But...I'm curious...about why...)
(This girl is carrying around an electric fan...)

group_1.textRight: Where did you get this? This headband!

group_1.textLeft: Huh, th-this?! It's a gift...

group_1.textRight: Do you know where I can buy it?

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm, it looks a bit expensive to me...
It seems like it was ordered, so maybe it's not@something you can buy in Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: You look serious, did something happen to you...?

group_1.textRight: Actually, I need that headband...
...for comedy material!

group_1.textLeft: Comedy material...

group_1.textRight: I was originally planning to use this air circulator@for my comedy act...
But I just found out that the venue where the@"Ward Comedy Contest" is being held...
Won't have the power supply available...

group_1.textLeft: You wonâ€™t be able to put on your act anymore!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, but just when I was about to give up!
I spotted this headband of yours and it@gave me all kinds of inspiration!
I can even imagine myself winning and being@interviewed!
I'm having a toast in my brain right now!

group_1.textLeft: A toast...

group_1.textRight: But I see...it was a gift...

group_1.textLeft: If you want, I can give it to you?

group_1.textRight: [chara:301901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]That headband...?!
Is that okay?!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! Good luck with your contest!

group_1.textRight: Thank you! I'll give you this air circulator@in return!
No, there's no way we can carry that around@with us...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you!

group_1.textRight: What?!
It's my one-time dummy! And I'll give you@the comedy material to use with it!

group_1.textLeft: One-time...dummy...
You couldn't mean...using that air circulator for...
Ventriloquism...?

group_1.textRight: Correct!
We got...comedy material...

group_1.textLeft: The world is such a wide place.
Hmm...this might be kinda heavy...

group_1.textRight: That's why I tried to stop you...
The comedy material has nothing to do with@taiyaki or your charm...

group_1.textLeft: It didn't go like the time with the mushrooms@at all, huh?

group_1.textRight: But she did say something at the end that@caught my attention a little.

group_1.textCenter: I heard about "taiyaki that will make you@completely faint"...
But I don't remember who I heard it from...@I don't think it was a girl in my class...
Hmm... Nope! Can't remember anything else.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
That must be what we're looking for!
